title: Physics can show us the inside of tumors

title_detail.value: Physics can show us the inside of tumors

summary: A team of physicists has demonstrated the potential, for oncology, of an imaging technique based only on the physical properties of tumors. It can differentiate populations of malignant cells and monitor how effective an anticancer treatment is. These results should help in the design of new therapeutic molecules and in the personalization of treatments.
